Posts.Content: hadle wrote: HI!   scheduled for 3 biopsies resulting from MRI.  One is quite suspicious, other two not so much.  Doc told me that based on ultra sound image, she is almost certain the suspicious one is BC.  If biopsy is negative, she wants an excisional biopsy because she is so certain it is positive.  Has anyone ever heard of this?  I'm in the high risk group. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: ultra sound almost definitely positive hadle lago
